attributes.action: Scrap the terrible new Olympic 2012 Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new 2012 olympic logo was launched today and seems to be bringing complaint from every quarter.

Sign this petition to have the government scrap this expensive piece of rubbish that will just bring derision to the British People.

Instead, lets opent his up to a nationwide, public competition. Anyone can enter and a short list of 12 can go to a cheap telephone vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
